This photograph is printed on Epson Somerset® Velvet Fine Art Paper using Epson UltraChrome™ inks.

This piece is framed and ready to ship. Dimensions of the piece (including frame) are: 17.75"x12"x1.5". If you are a local buyer you pay no shipping and I will deliver the piece myself!
